import { useState } from 'react'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; // Import the js-cookie library function SectionCanEducation() { const [education, setEducation] = useState({ educationCategory: '', // Correct field name course: '', university: '', }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setEducation((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, })); }; const inputStyles = { width: '100%', // Make the input take up the full width of its container height: windowWidth <= 480 ? '40px' : windowWidth <= 768 ? '45px' : windowWidth <= 1024 ? '50px' : '55px', // Height adapts based on screen width border: 'none', backgroundColor: '#e0ffff', // Light blue background borderRadius: '8px', paddingLeft: windowWidth <= 480 ? '10%' : windowWidth <= 768 ? '8%' : windowWidth <= 1024 ? '6%' : '5%', // Adjust padding for different screen sizes fontFamily: 'Rubik, sans-serif', fontSize: windowWidth <= 480 ? '14px' : windowWidth <= 768 ? '16px' : windowWidth <= 1024 ? '18px' : '20px', // Adjust font size for different screen sizes color: 'rgb(153, 153, 153)', boxSizing: 'border-box', // Ensure padding is included in the width and height margin: '10px 0', // Optional: Adds spacing around the input display: 'block', // Ensures the input takes up its container }; const handleSave = async () => { const userId = Cookies.get('candidateId'); // Fetching userId from cookies if (!userId) { console.error('User ID not found. Please log in again.'); return; } try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/resume-education', { // Use '/resume-education' here method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ education: [education], // Send education data as an array }), credentials: 'include', }); const data = await response.json(); console.log(data); // Log the response data if (response.ok) { console.log('Education details saved successfully!'); setEducation({ educationCategory: '', course: '', university: '' }); // Clear the form } else { console.error(data.message || 'Error saving education details'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error saving education details:', error); } }; return ( <>

); } export default SectionCanEducation;
